channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from christinasots_

item.title: Follow @bunchuk for more easy, delicious vegan recipes. Turn the humble cabbage into a delicious dish that’s high in protein and jam packed full of flavours and textures. Serve with a side of rice for a complete meal. Serves 2 Time: 30 mins Ingredients

item.title: One tray, 30 mins and a short list of everyday ingredients are all you need to get this saucy, hearty meal on the table. It's got fibre and protein from the butter beans and gnocchi, a little kick from the harissa, finished with a light drizzle of tahini

item.title: Freekeh is my favourite grain and I would love to see more people eating it! - It’s really high in protein and fibre. One small serving (half cup) of cooked freekeh has about 8 grams of protein. - It also contains zinc, iron, copper, potassium, calcium,
item.description: Freekeh is my favourite grain and I would love to see more people eating it! - It’s really high in protein and fibre. One small serving (half cup) of cooked freekeh has about 8 grams of protein. - It also contains zinc, iron, copper, potassium, calcium,

item.title: If you’ve never tried the combination of tahini with date syrup, let me tell you that it’s the most decadent, indulgent caramel-y drizzle that ever existed. Creamy, nutty and perfectly balanced sweetness. So of course it was insanely good on an affogato!
item.description: If you’ve never tried the combination of tahini with date syrup, let me tell you that it’s the most decadent, indulgent caramel-y drizzle that ever existed. Creamy, nutty and perfectly balanced sweetness. So of course it was insanely good on an affogato!

item.title: Silken tofu is the ideal speedy lunch or dinner so I always keep some in the cupboard. This is a really delicious and summery way to eat it! Full recipe is below and also on my website (link in my bio). Ingredients: 1 x 300g box silken tofu 15g toasted
item.description: Silken tofu is the ideal speedy lunch or dinner so I always keep some in the cupboard. This is a really delicious and summery way to eat it! Full recipe is below and also on my website (link in my bio). Ingredients: 1 x 300g box silken tofu  15g toasted

item.title: I WROTE A COOKBOOK! I couldn’t be more excited to share this news :) My first cookbook, Big Veg Energy is available to preorder now from a selection of retailers and you can find the link in my bio. Preorders mean the absolute world to first time authors

item.title: I found the perfect vegan brownie recipe on the @GuardianFeast app! There are so many vegan recipes on there! There are also loads of great features like the search bar which lets you search by your favourite chefs, dietaries, ingredients and meal type.

item.title: If you’re looking for a creamy, cosy bowl of goodness that you can make in 10 minutes - you’ve just found one. A dollop of vegan cream cheese mixed with the cherry tomato juice and the butterbean aquafaba magincally turns into a delicious velvety broth.
